description.narrative: To increase the efficiency, accountability and transparency of public financial management and to improve the management of civil service human resources and wages.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.A.1. (a) | Description :The Recipient shall establish and thereafter maintain a ProjectSteering Committee, whose mandate , terms of reference and composition shall be acceptable to the Association. | Frequency :Monthly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.A.1. (b) | Description :The recipient shall establish and thereafter maintain ProjectCoordination Unit to be headed by the Coordinator, and those mandate,terms of reference and composition shall be acceptable toIDA. | Frequency :Monthly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.A.2. (b) | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that the Project coordinator shall beassisted by a team of key personnel consisting of an accountant assistant, a FM consultant and an administrative assistant |Frequency :Monthly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.B.2. (a) | Description :The recipient shall not later than 12 months after effectivenessdate, in conjunction with the Bank and other interested donors, undertake a midterm review of the Project | Due Date :31-Mar-2012

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II.A.1 | Description :The Recipient shall monitor and evaluate the progress of the projectand prepare Project Reports in accordance with the provision of Scction 4.08 of the G.C'; covering one calendar semester | DueDate :30-Jun-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II.B.2 | Description :The Recipient shall prepare and furnish to the association, as part ofthe Project reports, not later than one month after the end of each calendar quarter, interim unaudited financial report. |Frequency :Quarterly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II.B.3 | Description :The recipient shall furnish to the Association not later than sixmonths after the end of each Fiscal year, its audited Financial Statements covering the period of one Fiscal Year | Due Date:30-Jun-2012

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II.B.4. (a) | Description :The Recipient shall have recruited, not later than three monthsafter the Effectiveness date, under terms of reference acceptable to the Bank, the auditors referred to in Section 4.09 (b) of GC.| Due Date :31-May-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II.B.4. (b) | Description :The Recipient shall have acquired, not later that three monthsafter the Effectiveness date, a suitable accounting software | Due Date :31-May-2011

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section V.1. (a) | Description :The Recipient shall, not later than December 15 in each calendaryear, prepare and submit to the Bank, for review and approval, a proposed Annual Work Plan and Budget for the forthcoming FY. |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Section I.A.2 of Schedule 2 | Description :The Recipient shall update the Project Implementation Manual for theProject, on form and substance satisfactory to the Association. | Due Date :20-Mar-2014

Finance Agreement :Section I.A.3 of Schedule 2 | Description :The Recipient shall recruit a public finance reform specialist, anaccounting assistant and procurement assistant as well as, when it shall have been agreed between the Association and theRecipient, a civil service reform specialist, each on the basis of terms of reference, qualifications and experience satisfactoryto the Association. | Due Date :20-Mar-2014

Finance Agreement :Section II, B.4 of Schedule 2 | Description :The Recipient shall engage independent auditors to carry out anannual audit of the Project's financial statements. | Due Date :20-Apr-2014

Finance Agreement :Section II.A.4 of Schedule 2 | Description :The Recipient shall: (a) adopt a monitoring and evaluation manualfor the Project, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association; and (b) recruit a monitoring and evaluation specialist forthe Project, on the basis of terms of reference, qualifications and experience satisfactory to the Association and in accordancewith the provisions of Section III of this Schedule. | Due Date :20-Mar-2014

Finance Agreement :Section.II.A. 2 of schedule 2 | Description :The Recipient shall, in conjunction with the Association, carry outa mid-term review of the Project (the “Mid-term Review”). | Due Date :20-Apr-2015
